
```{python}
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt    
movies_url = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vega-datasets@1/data/movies.json'
movies = pd.read_json(movies_url)

# unaggregated scatter plot
alt.Chart(movies_url).mark_point().encode(
    alt.X('Release_Date:T', title = "Release Date"),
    alt.Y('US_Gross:Q', title = "US Gross ($)")
)


```

```{python}
alt.Chart(movies_url).mark_area().encode(
    alt.X('month(Release_Date):T', title = "Release Date"),
    alt.Y('average(US_Gross):Q', title = "US Gross ($)")
)
```
